name: Space Marmalade (jbh3d)
description:
In the far reaches of space, your tiny spacecraft has been caught in the gravity well of a black hole! All hope may be lost, but you're not one to give up. Luckily some dark energy capsules from a far-off space wreck have made their way into the black hole's gravity well too. They are conveniently compatible with your ship's engine, so collect them to get back to full energy to escape!

Use your thruster and repulsor wisely, as they cost energy to use...

Good luck!
